Topic.Title: Site monitors - what do I need to do to get approved?

Posts.EditableText: My game, "StoreyMinus", has been out for a while and it's still not reviewed for being categorized. Do I need to do something else to get this to happen?
Posts.HTML: My game, "StoreyMinus", has been out for a while and it's still not reviewed for being categorized. Do I need to do something else to get this to happen?

Posts.EditableText: Apparently, I just had to ask. Thanks for putting my game to full RPG status :)
Posts.HTML: Apparently, I just had to ask. Thanks for putting my game to full RPG status :)

Posts.EditableText: Can somebody do mine? It's The Adventures of Elmer Fudd
